ISSUE.TITLE: Unable to update stock quantities when trying to update the qty in the edit form of the attribute combination.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 beta Error: Unable to update stock quantities when trying to update the qty in the edit form of the attribute combination. The error message says "The same combination already exists" even though I was just trying to update the stock quantities in the combination attributes, not adding new combination. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/80144/find-bugs-in-nopcommerce-430-beta-and-earn-10/page/7#261597

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4446 Removed appropriate fields from ProductEditorSettings entity

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4513 Fixed problem with updating product attribute combination
